scripts.setup: npm install && npm run db:bootstrap && npm run db:push && npm run db:seed
scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c cyan,magenta "npm run dev -w backend" "npm run dev -w frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build -w backend && npm run build -w frontend
scripts.test: npm run test -w backend && npm run test -w frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w backend && npm run lint -w frontend
